Task.Message: Startup of the serial class extension
Task.Name: SER_CX_Startup

Task.Message: IO Control received by the serial class extension
Task.Name: SER_CX_Ioctl

Task.Message: Request received by the serial class extension
Task.Name: SER_CX_TxRx

Event.Task: Startup of the serial class extension
Event.Message: The Serial WDF class extension has started. The control object name is %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ControlDeviceName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Status" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Task: Startup of the serial class extension
Event.Message: The Serial WDF class extension failed to start (error %2). The control object name is %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ControlDeviceName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Status" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Task: IO Control received by the serial class extension
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Request" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="IoControlCodeString" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Task: IO Control received by the serial class extension
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Request" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="IoControlCodeString" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Task: Request received by the serial class extension
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Request" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="Length" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Task: Request received by the serial class extension
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Request" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="Length" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Task: Request received by the serial class extension
Event.Message: Completed request %1 for %2 byte(s) with status %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Request" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="Length" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Status" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Task: Request received by the serial class extension
Request received by the serial class extension
Event.Message: EvtIoStop for request %1 in queue %2, invoke cancel
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Request" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="Queue" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> </template>
